all stages: R&D design, technical evaluation, processing & manufacturing, and product installation. It is supply chains, digital transformation, a culture of excellence among employees, and social responsibility.
committed to providing high-performance products to the market, complying with ASTM, NFRC, CSA, and
AS/NZS standards. Over 10 years of data collection, Bucalu's products have achieved energy savings of 20%-36%, equivalent to
planting four trees per household annually. We have obtained the PHB rating from the German Passive House
